Please use the shorter YAML syntax for parameters, it is easier to read.

@@ -5454,6 +5468,64 @@ paths:

timeline.message:
Few OpenAPI methods added

* getUserRoleNames method was added into authzResolver manager
* createAlternativePassword method was added into user manager
* deleteAlternativePassword method was added into user manager
